setFinalWeights() - Method in class GenotypeGraph.WeightedGenotypeGraph
Set up weights using this formula: W() = [Wdown()*(Wup()/Wup(b))]/[sum_{x \in a.Adj}Wdown()*(Wup()/Wup(x)]

setObservedProbabilities() - Method in class GenotypeGraph.WeightedGenotypeGraph
Sets observation probabilities up for each node (P(genotype) = #count(genotype in dataset)/#sizeof(dataset)) Note: resets nodes IDs (needed for fast access to weights'lists)
